original_text: You live like that because you hope to receive good things from God. You know that God has prepared those good things for you. He is keeping them safe in heaven. You learned that when people first told you God's true message, his good news.
korean_text: 너희를 위하여 하늘에 쌓아 둔 소망으로 말미암음이니 곧 너희가 전에 복음 진리의 말씀을 들은 것이라

sentences.original_text: because you hope to receive good things from God
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 당신은 하나님께서 좋은 것들을 받기를 바라기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: You know that God has prepared those good things for you
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 하나님께서 그 좋은 것들을 당신을 위해 준비하셨다는 것을 압니다

sentences.original_text: He is keeping them safe in heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 그것들을 하늘에 안전하게 지키고 계십니다

sentences.original_text: when people first told you God's true message
sentences.korean_translation: 사람들이 처음 당신에게 하나님의 진실한 메시지를 말했을 때
